verses.verse: The <S%H4853>burden<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyre.<s%> <S%H3213>Howl,<s%> you <S%H591>ships<s%> of <S%H8659>Tarshish!<s%> For it is laid <S%H7703>waste,<s%> so that there is no <S%H1004>house,<s%> no entering <S%H935>in.<s%> From the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3794>Kittim<s%> it is revealed to <S%H1540>them.<s%>

Be <S%H1826>still,<s%> you <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H339>coast,<s%> you whom the <S%H5503>merchants<s%> of <S%H6721>Sidon,<s%> that pass <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> have <S%H4390>replenished.<s%>

On <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4325>waters,<s%> the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of the <S%H7883>Shihor,<s%> the <S%H7105>harvest<s%> of the <S%H2975>Nile,<s%> was her <S%H8393>revenue.<s%> She was the <S%H5505>market<s%> of <S%H1471>nations.<s%>

Be <S%H954>ashamed,<s%> <S%H6721>Sidon;<s%> for the <S%H3220>sea<s%> has <S%H559>spoken,<s%> the <S%H4581>stronghold<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "I have not <S%H2342>travailed,<s%> nor brought <S%H3205>forth,<s%> neither have I <S%H1431>nourished<s%> young <S%H970>men,<s%> nor brought <S%H1431>up<s%> <S%H1330>virgins.<s%>"
When the <S%H8088>report<s%> comes to <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> they will be in <S%H2342>anguish<s%> at the <S%H8088>report<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyre.<s%>

Is this your <S%H5947>joyous<s%> <S%H6927>city,<s%> whose antiquity is of <S%H6924>ancient<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> whose <S%H7272>feet<s%> <S%H2986>carried<s%> her far <S%H7350>away<s%> to <S%H1481>travel?<s%>

Who has <S%H3289>planned<s%> this against <S%H6865>Tyre,<s%> the giver of <S%H5849>crowns,<s%> whose <S%H5503>merchants<s%> are <S%H8269>princes,<s%> whose <S%H3667>traffickers<s%> are the <S%H3513>honorable<s%> of the <S%H776>earth?<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies<s%> has <S%H3289>planned<s%> <S%H2490>it,<s%> to stain the <S%H1347>pride<s%> of all <S%H6643>glory,<s%> to bring into <S%H7043>contempt<s%> all the <S%H3513>honorable<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
<S%H5674>Pass<s%> through your <S%H776>land<s%> like the <S%H2975>Nile,<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H8659>Tarshish.<s%> There is no restraint any <S%H4206>more.<s%>

He has stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> over the <S%H3220>sea.<s%> He has <S%H7264>shaken<s%> the <S%H4467>kingdoms.<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H6680>ordered<s%> the <S%H8045>destruction<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>'s <S%H4581>strongholds.<s%>

He <S%H559>said,<s%> "You shall <S%H5937>rejoice<s%> no <S%H3254>more,<s%> you <S%H6231>oppressed<s%> <S%H1330>virgin<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6721>Sidon.<s%> <S%H6965>Arise,<s%> pass <S%H5674>over<s%> to <S%H3794>Kittim.<s%> Even there you will have no <S%H5117>rest.<s%>"

<S%H776>Behold,<s%> the land of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans.<s%> This <S%H5971>people<s%> was <S%H804>not.<s%> The Assyrians <S%H3245>founded<s%> it for those who dwell in the <S%H6728>wilderness.<s%> They set <S%H6965>up<s%> their <S%H971>towers.<s%> They <S%H6209>overthrew<s%> its <S%H759>palaces.<s%> They <S%H7760>made<s%> it a <S%H4654>ruin.<s%>
<S%H3213>Howl,<s%> you <S%H591>ships<s%> of <S%H8659>Tarshish,<s%> for your <S%H4581>stronghold<s%> is laid <S%H7703>waste!<s%>

It will come to pass in that <S%H3117>day<s%> that <S%H6865>Tyre<s%> will be <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> according to the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4428>king.<s%> After the <S%H7093>end<s%> of <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> it will be to <S%H6865>Tyre<s%> like in the <S%H7892>song<s%> of the <S%H2181>prostitute.<s%>

<S%H3947>Take<s%> a <S%H3658>harp;<s%> go <S%H5437>about<s%> the <S%H5892>city,<s%> you <S%H2181>prostitute<s%> that has been <S%H7911>forgotten.<s%> Make <S%H3190>sweet<s%> <S%H5059>melody.<s%> Sing <S%H7235>many<s%> <S%H7892>songs,<s%> that you may be <S%H2142>remembered.<s%>

It will happen after the <S%H7093>end<s%> of <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H6485>visit<s%> <S%H6865>Tyre,<s%> and she shall <S%H7725>return<s%> to her <S%H868>wages,<s%> and will play the <S%H2181>prostitute<s%> with all the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%H776>world<s%> on the <S%H6440>surface<s%> of the <S%H127>earth.<s%>

Her <S%H5504>merchandise<s%> and her <S%H868>wages<s%> will be <S%H6944>holiness<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> It will not be <S%H686>treasured<s%> nor laid <S%H2630>up;<s%> for her <S%H5504>merchandise<s%> will be for those who <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> to <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H7654>sufficiently,<s%> and for <S%H6266>durable<s%> <S%H4374>clothing.<s%>
